title.value: Продуктивность и формирование иммунного статуса телят при использовании препарата Бацинил
Productivity and formation of immune state of calves when using Batsinil preparation

journal.title: Zootechnical Science of Belarus: collection of scientific papers

person.name: Balueva, N.A., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breeding (Belarus)

abstract.value: The article presents the results of research on administration of Batsinil preparation in diet for calves during the preventive period. In Republican branch on breeding
Batsinil influence on energy of calves growth and the immune status in early ontogenesis and
definitions of an optimum level of its introduction have been lead scientifically-economic experience. It is established, that introduction of a preparation

in dairy forages to calves of the prophylaxis period has rendered positive influence on productive qualities of the animals, accompanied increase in alive weight at 5,8% (P-0,05); daily average and relative increase - on 9,7 (P-0,05) and 4,3%; intensity of metabolic processes (the contents of the general protein has increased for 3,8% (P-0,05), albumins - on 3,4% (P-0,05), scale-globulins - 7,7% (P-0,05)); the immune status of animals (increase in bactericidal activity of blood whey at 1,96% (P-0,01), lysozymic- on 0,79% (P-0,01), beta-lysine - 0,87%; antibodies - 5,2%, including: IgG+A and M - on 4,8 and 8,8% (P-0,05). The most expressed stimulating effect will achieve at introduction of a preparation
in a doze of 10 ml/goals in a day
